thegame.screens

Class TitleScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • thegame.screens.TitleScreen

  • public class TitleScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    The title screen of the game, first screen shown to the user. Displays the game title, login status, and navigation buttons.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TitleScreen(App app)
      Constructs a new title screen.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Handles character input events.
      void handleKeyPress(int key, int action)
      Handles keyboard key press events.
      void handleMouseClick(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Handles mouse clicks on buttons and transitions to appropriate screens.
      void handleMouseMove(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Updates the current mouse position.
      void handleMouseRelease(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Handles mouse button release events.
      void render()
      Renders the title screen, including animated background, title text, and buttons.
